name: Spiced Shrimp And Carrot Soup
keywords: appetizer, side dish, carrot, orzo, shrimp, fall
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 tablespoon minced parsley or coriander leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the carrot consomme to a boil in a large pot. Add the orzo, reduce heat to medium and cook for 3 minutes. Add the shrimp, ginger and carrots and cook for 2 minutes more. Add the fennel and cook 1 minute. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Ladle into bowls, garnish with scallions, parsley or coriander leaves and serve immediately.
